item.title: Ottawa Phoning to Stop the Cuts/Téléphoner pour arrêter les coupures
item.description: What We will be calling Power of Many supporters across the city to ask them to act and let their MPPs know that our province is not for sale to private corporations! We also need Ottawa residents to come, in large numbers, on the June 7th Day of Action events. Join us! We will train and provide a script, making it fun and easy! When June 05, 2019 5:30pm - 8pm Where Public Service Alliance of Canada (PSAC) building
